channel.title: nuget on my tech ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in nuget on my tech ramblings

item.title: How to Restore a Nuget from an Azure DevOps Private Feed within Docker
item.description: Let’s go for a quick post this time. You are trying to create a Docker image from an app, that application is using some custom Nugets. Those Nugets are hosted in your private Azure DevOps Feed. I’m pretty confident that some of these errors are going to sound pretty familiar to you when you try to build the image: /src/MyConsoleApplication.csproj : error NU1101: Unable to find package MyOwn.EmailService. No packages exist with this id in source(s): nuget.
